name: It's Just You and Me, Bucko
name_original: It's Just You and Me, Bucko
description:
It's Just You and Me, Bucko

Why live with the weight? Empty your head at any time. Keep your thoughts quiet - dump anything rough or difficult into Mush, an ever-present being built only to handle your subconscious runoff.

  • Click the button to empty your head of all thoughts.
  • Hear from Mush depending on how long it's been since you last called.
